thread.title: PARCO MURA Launches Exclusive Luxury iPhone 6S Models in Gold and Alligator Skin Embezzled with Precious Gemstones for Pre-Order
thread.title_full: PARCO MURA Launches Exclusive Luxury iPhone 6S Models in Gold and Alligator Skin Embezzled with Precious Gemstones for Pre-Order

author: Parco Mura
title: PARCO MURA Launches Exclusive Luxury iPhone 6S Models in Gold and Alligator Skin Embezzled with Precious Gemstones for Pre-Order
text:
The luxury designing and manufacturing company, PARCO MURA, announces the Luxury iPhone 6S Edition product line, which analysts expect to peak sales records to date. The PARCO MURA collection launches with numerous luxury models handmade of high quality materials such as 24-karat gold, alligator skin, and various precious stones. Each luxury model is designed and handmade exclusively in Los Angeles, California, USA.
PARCO MURA Gold Edition models are disassembled, hand polished, and prepared for plating. These models are plated with highly durable 24-karat gold, the finest and purest type of gold. Then, they are tested with accurate testing equipment to make sure they have 5.0 microns of gold thickness. Finally, they are reassembled and all functions of the device are tested multiple times before they are packaged to be shipped to the elite list of clients.
Alligator Skin Edition models are handcrafted of grade 1 alligator skin consisting of Alligator Mississippiensis, which is free of defects such as holes, scars, and scratches. The same of skin kind is used to create high-end designer handbags. PARCO MURA uses legal skins that comply with all laws and regulations.
In additional, PARCO MURA embezzles precious gemstones such as diamonds, rubies, and sapphires on the logo to craft an overall unique color combination.
Prices start at $6,999 and gradually increase based on the built material and the type of gemstones embezzled. Each premium device is standard to 128GB of internal memory storage and is factory unlocked for worldwide usage. All devices come with a certificate of authenticity, accessories, and standard manuals packaged in a luxury interior PARCO MURA brand case with a combination lock. In addition, PARCO MURA covers the luxury device with an exclusive one year warranty.
Prior to Appleâ€™s official launch of the next generation iPhone 6S, PARCO MURA is starting to take pre-orders for the initial volume of iPhones to ship out. PARCO MURA luxury iPhones are expected to ship out 2-3 weeks following the official US release of the iPhone 6S by Apple
About PARCO MURA
PARCO MURA is a Los Angeles-based company that designs and manufactures luxury products. The team consists of talented designers and brilliant-minded technicians whose goal is to bring the world high quality devices with luxurious fashionable design.
